item.title: Failed to open stream: DrupalTemporaryStreamWrapper::stream_open
item.description: From CLI This error is shown: failed to open stream: "DrupalTemporaryStreamWrapper::stream_open" call failed file.inc:1983 Solution Seems to be an issue with the temp file. Check “drush st” and confirm if the temp file is still accessible. This gives some hints on how to set the “temp and private files” in drupal setttings https://www.drupal.org/forum/support/installing-drupal/2011-03-01/failed-to-open-stream-drupaltemporarystreamwrapperstream#comment-4258986 However, my test showed using “/tmp” doesn’t seem to reflected in drupal. What works is adding the full path, something like this (valid only in D7, D8 syntax is different, see earlier link above from drupal.
